title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately triggers changes in the package view
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately triggers changes in the package view
OB: When a working set is removed, the package view in the background immediately filters its contents.
EB: When removing a working set, the package view should not be filtered until the working set selection dialog is closed. Additionally, pressing cancel should undo any changes made to the working sets, including canceling the removal of the working set.
SR:
1. Open the working set selection dialog.
2. Remove a working set.
3. Observe the package view in the background filtering its contents immediately. The filter should instead be applied only when the working set selection dialog is closed.
